simbench

collision simulator benchmark for robotics applications: RaiSim vs Bullet vs ODE vs MuJoCo vs Dart

View on GitHub

Rolling test

Rolling test is for testing frictional contact behavior. The error is measured by comparing the simulation with analytical solution. The test focuses on:

  1. Frictional cone (diagonal, elliptic)
  2. The accuracy of frictional contact simulation
  3. The violation of hard-contact constraint (penetration)
  4. The effect of ERP (error-correcting)

Test scenario

  • static ground
  • 10 kg box on the ground
  • 25 number of 1 kg balls on the box
  • 150 N force applied to box in the xy direction

Result
